title: leaver buster
body: I got a 20 minute leave buster after leaving one game because my wifi crashed. How does the leaver buster system work?

replies.body: my internet connection can be really bad sometimes and makes it nearly impossible to play league. there should be an algorithm which checks the behavior of the ping, champion movement and other lag characteristics to give players like me a chance of not waiting a total  of 100 min.
i got a dumb one where the game wouldnt let me reconnect and i got a leaver buster for it

An account won't receive a leaverbuster after only 1 game, but multiple leaves.  We have a solid [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) guide that can help offer some more visibility on the system as well.  20 minutes is a pretty escalated timer, so it's really important to get this resolved.  Let me know if I can help with any technical issues, and what specifically is going on for you.  I'm happy to help!
